title: Test if a Value is an Array

tests.text: You should choose the correct method for the first assertion - isArray vs. isNotArray.
You should choose the correct method for the second assertion - isArray vs. isNotArray.

description: As a reminder, this project is being built upon the following starter project on Gitpod, or cloned from GitHub.
instructions: Within tests/1_unit-tests.js under the test labeled #11 in the Arrays suite, change each assert to either assert.isArray or assert.isNotArray to make the test pass (should evaluate to true). Do not alter the arguments passed to the asserts.
